summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Olin Place as platted in O.W. Harris Addition, from 15th Avenue North near East Howe Street to 15th Avenue North, near East Garfield Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 111997 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
